job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtDescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAs a Machine Learning Software Engineer youll be working on largescale computer vision problems turning new ideas and the latest research into industryleading enterprise solutions You will be applying state of the art deep learning techniques to vast datasets of imagery and video You will be part of our machine learning team responsible for developing deep learning solutions endtoend from data processing to architecture development to deploymentltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtSignificant practical experience developing Deep Learning modelsltligt ltligtSpecialization in Machine Learning or highly relevant experienceltligt ltligtKnowledge of at least one of the Deep Learning frameworks TensorFlow Caffe Torch Theanoltligt ltligtExperience with computer vision OpenCV preferredltligt ltligtSolid software engineering skills across multiple languages including Python Cltligt ltligtExperience with deployment on cloud infrastructure preferredltligt ltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtBonus Pointsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtExperience with Ubuntu environment and the command lineltligt ltligtPublished peerreviewed research and involvement with the community conferences meetups etcltligt ltbrgtltulgtApplications are accepted and reviewed on a rolling basis More than one qualified applicant may be hiredltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtCompensation ampamp BenefitsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtSalary and stock as well as unlimited paid time off Awesome healthcare dental and vision benefits Regular team outings and other startupy things like board games team building activities and even the occasional game of curling
